articles.author: Megan Marples and Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: Jupiter is about to make its closest approach to Earth in 59 years - CNN
articles.description: With Jupiter's upcoming opposition on September 26, the planet will be about 367 million miles from Earth. Opposition means Earth is directly between Jupiter and the sun.
